testcase.name: TC_01 Validation of Hotel Booking in Audactin Webpage
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Audactin Webpage..........................................passed Then User verify Audactin Login Page is displayed...........................passed When User enters username and password......................................passed And User clicks Login Button................................................passed Then User verify Search Hotel Page is displayed.............................passed When User selects Location,Hotel,RoomType,NoOfRooms.........................passed And User clicks Search Button...............................................passed Then User verify Select Hotel Page is displayed.............................passed When User clicks Select Radio Button and clicks Continue Button.............passed Then User verify Book a Hotel Page is displayed.............................passed When User enters FirstName,LastName,BillingAddress..........................passed When User enters CardNumber,ExpiryMonth,ExpiryYear,CVV,CardType.............passed And User Clicks BookNow Button..............................................passed Then User verify OrderId is displayed.......................................passed
